unionListed: If the union list above doesn’t feature a particular union relevant to your firm, please contact Mason Support and we’ll partner with you to get the relevant union agreements and conditions imported into our system
unionNotListed:
We’re still working on setting up the back-end logic to accurately reflect this union’s agreements and conditions. If you selected a union in this list, we’re already working with your firm to get that resolved!
